name: HazardousHome
description:
This game was made as a third semester project with the theme of 3D jump n' run. Story:

You are a nature elemental and a factory was built ontop of your old home and the steam and smoke of all the machinery is hurting and slowly killing your homeland and you and your people. Now you make yourself on the way to the main tower of the factory to destroy it and save your people.

Gameplay:

On your way towards and up the tower you have to evade death by jumping from balcony to balcony and avoid the deadly smoke. Inside you use the machinery to your advantage to further progress up the tower, but be careful to not get squished like a bug.

Tutorial:

Move with WASD or left stick
Jump with Spacebar or South Button

Speedrun times:

1. 2:22 - Liuq
2. 2:57 - cuwuu
3. 3:00 -LeChop

Taken with LiveSplit, time started on first input. Comment your best time below to be added<3
